mapper.insert:
insert into demo.vul_map(VUL_NAME, VUL_TYPE_NAME, VUL_RISK, VUL_STATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG, TENANT_ID) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.vulName}, #{entity.vulTypeName}, #{entity.vulRisk}, #{entity.vulState}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.tenantId})

insert into demo.vul_map(VUL_NAME, VUL_TYPE_NAME, VUL_RISK, VUL_STATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG, TENANT_ID) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.vulName}, #{entity.vulTypeName}, #{entity.vulRisk}, #{entity.vulState}, #{entity.createDate}, #{entity.updateDate}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.tenantId})
on duplicate key update VUL_NAME = values(VUL_NAME) , VUL_TYPE_NAME = values(VUL_TYPE_NAME) , VUL_RISK = values(VUL_RISK) , VUL_STATE = values(VUL_STATE) , CREATE_DATE = values(CREATE_DATE) , UPDATE_DATE = values(UPDATE_DATE) , DEL_FLAG = values(DEL_FLAG) , TENANT_ID = values(TENANT_ID)
